review_data.title: Good meal for the family

review_data.title: Excellent Swiss food and drink in the heart of Zurich
review_data.content: An excellent Swiss restaurant in the centre of Zurich. Bright, clean and with friendly helpful staff. Both the food and wine offer the best of local styles. The Himmelsleiterli is an excellent red wine and the Vermicelli is a superb dessert.
